comment: /**  * Configures logging without Elasticsearch configuration files based on the system property "es.logger.level" only. As such, any  * logging will be written to the console.  */
code: /**  * Configures logging without Elasticsearch configuration files based on the system property "es.logger.level" only. As such, any  * logging will be written to the console.  */ public static void configureLoggingWithoutConfig() {     // initialize default for es.logger.level because we will not read the log4j2.properties     final String loggerLevel = System.getProperty("es.logger.level", Level.INFO.name()).     final Settings settings = Settings.builder().put("logger.level", loggerLevel).build().     LogConfigurator.configureWithoutConfig(settings). }
